messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You are in Starbucks and you find a magic coffee bean with which you can teleport to any room only once. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the stores connected to Starbucks.
Step 2: Find the path with the most connections for each store connected to Starbucks.
Step 3: Compare the paths and choose the one with the most connections.

1. Stores connected to Starbucks: Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora.
2. Path for each store:
   a) Paris Baguette: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea, Nike, Carter Children, Pete's Coffee, Sephora, Bath and Body Works (15 stores)
   b) H&M: Starbucks, H&M, Zara, Paris Baguette, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea, Nike, Carter Children, Pete's Coffee, Sephora, Bath and Body Works (15 stores)
   c) Zara: Starbucks, Zara, H&M, Paris Baguette, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea, Nike, Carter Children, Pete's Coffee, Sephora, Bath and Body Works (15 stores)
   d) Sephora: Starbucks, Sephora, Bath and Body Works, Nike, Carter Children, Pete's Coffee, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea (15 stores)

3. All paths have the same number of connections (15 stores). Therefore, any of the paths can be chosen.

Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Marshalls, Target, GNC Live Well, Levis, Baskins and Robins, Chickflea, Nike, Carter Children, Pete's Coffee, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
